name: History of Gender and Sexuality
description: This course provides an introduction to the history of gender and sexuality.

name: Historical Context of Gender and Sexuality
description: This course explores the historical contexts in which gender and sexuality have been constructed.

name: Gender and Sexuality in the United States
description: This course examines the evolution of gender and sexuality in the United States from the colonial era to the present.
prerequisites: Historical Context of Gender and Sexuality

name: Comparative Gender and Sexuality
description: This course looks at gender and sexuality from a comparative perspective, exploring different cultural, social, and political systems.
prerequisites: Gender and Sexuality in the United States
